#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define N 200005
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

ll H[N], dp[N], n;

int main(){

	cin>>n;
	dp[n-1] = 0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)	cin>>H[i];

	for(int i=n-2;i>=0;i--){
		dp[i] = INT_MAX;
		for(int j=1 ;i+j<n;j*=2)	dp[i] = min(dp[i], abs(H[i+j] - H[i]) + dp[i+j] );
	}

	//for(int i=0;i<n;i++)	cout<<dp[i]<<" ";
	//cout<<endl;
	cout<<dp[0]<<endl;

	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
